settings.title: A different take on fashion, accessories, and decor
settings.content: We saw an opportunity to do more for the world around us. To share the good. To share good design. To share the people and places of inspiration, stories of how a cherished item came to be, and then sharing that good back into the world. We wanted to be a company that does good for all of us.

settings.title: Shipping & Returns
settings.answer:
Rockflowerpaper takes pride in delivering the highest quality merchandise and wants you to be satisfied with your purchase 

Merchandise must be returned within 30 days of receipt.

Products must be in the condition you received them and in the original box and/or packaging. Orders returned outside of the 30 days will not be refunded or shipped back to the customer. 

Face Masks and items from the sale section of our website are not eligible for return or exchange.

Sale items received at our warehouse will not be refunded, exchanged or shipped back to the customer.

Customers are responsible for paying their own return shipping.

The cost of any shipping labels generated on the rockflowerpaper website will be deducted from your final refund.

Rockflowerpaper is unable to refund shipping fees associated with your purchase or return.

Please report damaged or defective items to our Customer Service team immediately upon receipt here or (800) 281-0357.

Please allow 10 business days for your return or exchange to be processed. For refunds, a credit will automatically be applied to your credit card. Please note that it can take a few days for your credit to appear in your credit card account.

As always please don’t hesitate to contact us should you have any questions about your purchase.

Thank you for shopping with rockflowerpaper!

settings.title: Chat With Us

settings.title: Find a Store

settings.title: Tell Your Story
settings.content: Each piece of jewelry in our collection showcases the unique beauty within us all. Our jewelry is handcrafted by artisans from Jaipur, India, the jewelry capital of the world. Every piece is a beautiful and sophisticated masterpiece that tells your unique story. Jewelry isn’t just an accessory. It’s a statement.

settings.title: Jewelry That Makes a Difference
settings.description: We are proud to partner with one of the finest jewelers in Jaipur – a brilliant craftsman and philanthropist who provides financial support to a variety of organizations that focus on educating orphans and providing food and shelter for people suffering from poverty.  Saddened by the poverty that he saw on his travels home from the US, he decided to move back to India with the goal of growing his business and elevating his ability to give back.

settings.title: A Culture of Key Artisans
settings.description: The Key Artisans come from generations of jewelry creators. They hand draw masterpiece designs, choose the perfect combination of metal, gems, beads, and colors. The Key Artisan then produces a finished masterpiece original. These masterpieces are recreated by other artisans. That's why every handcrafted piece tells a unique story and no two pieces are alike. Becoming a Key Artisan is a great honor. Your purchase helps to ensure that these beautiful traditions continue to be passed on from generation to generation.

settings.text_newsletter: Notify me when this product is available:

settings.title: A Little Green Goes a Long Way
settings.content: Never have we needed a splash of color and life in our lives more than now. Our succulents add just a touch of happiness to every corner of our homes. Colorful plants and pots, easy to maintain, guaranteed to arrive alive.

settings.title: California Grown
settings.description: Our succulents come from a local California grower with a major green thumb dedicated to all things succulents! He started working at his nursery when he arrived from Mexico at age 16. Four years ago he bought the business from the original owners and has since grown it into a booming family business working along side his son every day, raising succulents ranging from unique and rare to tried and true classics. Our grower puts meticulous care and love into his succulents that comes through in the vibrant colors and beautiful quality you can see in your plant.

settings.title: Handled With Love
settings.description: Our succulents and pots ship out of San Anselmo, CA where we receive new plants weekly so you always get a fresh plant! Our in-house master gardener carefully packages each order, paying special attention to the health and condition of your succulent. Our custom packaging keeps your new plant friend safe while in transit on its way to you. Plus our quick shipping means your plant’s journey doesn’t take too long!

settings.text_newsletter: Notify me when this product is available:

settings.title: Artfully Crafted
settings.description: Our unique scarves and clothing more than just beautiful prints. We work with artists around the globe to create exclusive works of art to be worn and appreciated. Drawing inspiration from our surroundings, every print starts with an idea, a painting or a sketch.

settings.title: Lovingly Produced in Noida
settings.description: Our silk scarf production facility is located in Noida, one of India's greenest cities. It's known for its modern infrastructure and best-in-class amenities. Throughout production, each step from material sourcing to stitching, quality checks, and packaging, is done with a focus on quality.

settings.title: Dedicated to Empowering Women.
settings.description: Our factory in Noida invests heavily in supporting women in the rural surroundings, helping them enter the workforce, and providing ongoing technical and soft skills training.

settings.text_newsletter: Notify me when this product is available:

settings.title: Empowerment Through Training
settings.content: Working with India’s National Skill Development Corporation, locals are given training and jobs to manufacture our garments, providing them with income and independence. Our factory in Kolkata treats employees like family, working to improve their lives and providing medical assistance and scholarships for children of employees.

settings.title: Made in the City of Joy
settings.description: Kolkata is known for embodying a rich culture of the old and the new, and is known as the cultural capital of India.

settings.text_newsletter: Notify me when this product is available:

settings.title: Artfully Crafted
settings.description: Our unique scarves and clothing more than just beautiful prints. We work with artists around the globe to create exclusive works of art to be worn and appreciated. Drawing inspiration from our surroundings, every print starts with an idea, a painting, a sketch.

It's our joy to support these artists and their creativity, and to bring their work into the homes of customers worldwide.

settings.title: A Unique, Personal Addition to Your Home
settings.description: By working with so many different artists, we're able to provide trays with not only a variety of designs, but artistic styles, allowing you to find the perfect match for your home.

settings.title: A different take on fashion, accessories, and decor
settings.content: We saw an opportunity to do more for the world around us. To share the good. To share good design. To share the people and places of inspiration, stories of how a cherished item came to be, and then sharing that good back into the world. We wanted to be a company that does good for all of us.

settings.title: Products that benefit the planet and its people
settings.description: Whether giving back to causes that care for our planet, or supporting manufacturers dedicated to improving the lives of their workers, we strive to not only serve our customers, but also the hands and communities that produce our products.

settings.title: Partnering with others who care
settings.description: We carefully select all our factories and form strong relationships with them. Employing an on-site colleague to ensure that our products are made responsibly and to our standards, we continue to stay true to our commitment to offering well-priced, high quality goods.

settings.title: Ocean Conservancy
settings.content: Ocean Conservancy’s Trash Free Seas program is multi pronged – they collect 18 million pounds of trash at their annual international beach cleanup, work to stop the flow of trash at its source, and use research to find innovative, sustainable solutions for the ocean’s biggest threats. With your purchase, you're helping them in this important work.

settings.title: Benefitting the Planet and its People
settings.description: In a world where people are more environmentally conscious than ever, we are pleased to offer products that are sustainable both in the way they are made and in their function. Our blu collection does 3 things – it educates the consumer about sustainability, supports Ocean Conservancy with every purchase, and helps the environment by reducing waste either in its manufacturing method or its utility.

settings.content: Our prints are as unique as the natural wonders that inspired them. As we’ve traveled the globe, we’ve photographed and painted countless colors and textures that we wished to share with our customers – honoring the beauty and wonder of our planet.

settings.title: Each One Made by Hand
settings.description: All our designs are silkscreened by hand, ensuring the best possible attention to detail and artisitry.

settings.title: How Do I Cancel My Order?
settings.answer:
Please contact our customer service team by clicking here. Be sure to state that you want to cancel the order in the "Subject" field, and include your name, your entire order, and the order number in the "Description" field.

It's best to reach out as soon as possible if you want to cancel orders. Once the order ships, we no longer have the power to cancel or recall orders.

settings.title: How Do I Make Changes to an Order?
settings.answer:
We love our customers and want you to be completely satisfied with your experience at rockflowerpaper. Changes once an order is placed cannot be guaranteed, but we will do our best to help!

 To modify an order you've already placed, please click here

settings.title: How Do I Process a Return?
settings.answer:
Rockflowerpaper takes pride in delivering the highest quality merchandise and wants you to be completely satisfied with your purchase.

Merchandise must be returned within 30 days of receipt. Products must be in the condition you received them and in the original box and/or packaging.

Items from the sale section of our website are not eligible for return or exchange. Sale items received at our warehouse will not be refunded, exchanged or shipped back to the customer.
Please report damaged or defective items to our Customer Service team immediately upon receipt here or (800) 281-0357.

Return Shipping- Customers are responsible for paying their own return shipping. Rockflowerpaper is unable to refund shipping fees associated with your purchase or return.

To process a return or exchange:

Complete attached Customer Claim FormPlace item in box and/or original packaging. Place a copy of your invoice and completed Return Form in the box.

Ship to:

rockflowerpaper
6575 Huntley Road, Unit I
Columbus, OHIO 43229

Please allow 10 business days for your return or exchange to be processed. For refunds, a credit will automatically be applied to your credit card. Please note that it can take a few days for your credit to appear in your credit card account.

As always please don’t hesitate to contact us should you have any questions about your purchase.

Thank you for shopping with rockflowerpaper!

settings.title: How Do I Track My Order?
settings.answer:
If you have an account, sign in and hover over your account settings dropdown in the upper right hand corner of the page (next to the cart icon). Click on "Orders" and you'll see all of your pending and fulfilled orders. From there, you can see if your order is processing, shipped, or delivered.

We'll also send you a shipment notification email once your order ships from our warehouse. In that email is a package tracking number. Click the tracking number, and it will redirect you to the courier's website where you can keep track of your order.

settings.title: How Does You Cart Work?
settings.answer:
The bag icon at the top right corner of the page is your cart. The number will tell you how many items are in the cart.

From here, you can edit quantities of the items in your cart by clicking the bag and pressing the + or - buttons, or by replacing the quantity number.

If you want to remove an item completely, change the item quantity to 0 or click "Empty Cart".

If you decide that you want to checkout, the "Checkout" button below your items.

settings.title: How We Fit & Size Our Apparel
settings.answer:
Getting the fit right on our clothing, especially when designing a new silhouette, is a team effort involving many steps and a fine attention to detail. We consider every element of the garment - from its overall shape and length, to its neck drop and bottom sweep, to the drape of the fabric, down to exact button placement - all which create the easy, elegant fit that you love.

We begin by creating a prototype in a standard U.S. size medium. Our professional fit model Michelle and our technical designer Grace come in for a fit meeting. Our owner Katie Smith and our VP of Design Katie Shillinglaw are also at this meeting to make sure that everyone voices their feedback and is on the same page as we move forward with a design.

To keep the sizing consistent across all our apparel, we use Michelle as our fit model for every garment. We spent a lot of time determining who our customer is and what kind of fit we wanted for that customer. After a careful search, we chose Michelle, who has been a fit model for 18 years and represents our ideal size medium. She tries on the prototype and provides comments about fit, comfort, and ease of movement. 

Grace makes adjustments to the garment and brainstorms options with us if we feel that the design needs any changes, like a different shape for a neckline, a lower hemline, or more fitted sleeves. She takes copious notes and a lot of photos and sends a new spec to the manufacturer to create a second prototype. A technical designer for 30 years and formerly the Manager of Technical Design for Travelsmith and Athleta, Grace preps all our samples and tech packs for our manufacturers to produce final products.

Sometimes, one garment needs up to 4 rounds of sampling and revisions before we feel that the fit and the fabric are exactly what we want. We also wash every prototype to ensure that our washing instructions are correct. The final step is ordering a size run, and we compare each size to Grace’s specs to make sure that all of our clothing is perfect for you.

settings.title: How Will I Know if My Order has Shipped?
settings.answer:
We'll send you two emails once you make your purchase.

1. Order Confirmation - We'll send this email to you as soon as our system accepts your order. This email will usually be sent within minutes of your order. Please contact us if you haven't received this email and we'll double-check to see if your order is in our system.

2. Shipping Confirmation - We'll send this email as soon as your order leaves our warehouse. It will come with all the requisite tracking information so you'll be informed of the ETA and shipping progress of your order. Depending on the shipping option you choose, it may take a few days to receive this email. If it's been a few weeks and you haven't received your order OR this email, please contact us and we'll look into the issue for you.

settings.title: Shipping Policy
settings.answer:
Orders will be shipped from our Ohio warehouse within 2 business days of placing your order. If you place your order before 11am Eastern Time Monday – Friday your order will be processed and shipped the same day. Orders placed after 11am will be processed and shipped next business day. If you placed an order over the weekend, it will be processed and shipped the following Monday. Standard transit time for continental US locations is 2-5 business days.

Our shipping and handling charges are based on your order’s subtotal:

- Orders up to $75 have a shipping and handling charge of $5.95 for Ground service.

- Orders $75 and over qualify for Free Ground service*

Please note, Free shipping applies only to retail online orders shipped via ground (standard) and totaling $75+ after applicable discounts and before shipping, handling and taxes where applicable are added. Rates quoted on this page do not apply to International shipping, non-continental U.S. shipping, Express or Overnight shipping.  

If you have any questions regarding our shipping policies or your order, please email us.

settings.title: Size Guide
settings.answer:
Chest -  Measure under your arms, around the fullest part of your chest

Waist -  Measure around your natural waistline, keeping the tape a bit loose

Hip -  Stand with feet together and measure around the fullest part of your hips 

SIZE CHART

All measurements are listed in inches. Please ensure that our new size chart applies to your desired item(s) by checking the sizing section of the relevant product page, located underneath the product description. 

US Size Small: 4 - 6
Chest: 33 - 46
Waist: 27 - 28
Hip: 36.5 - 37.5

US Size Medium: 8 - 10
Chest: 37 - 38
Waist: 29 - 30
Hip: 38.5 - 39.5

US Size Large: 12 - 14
Chest: 39.5 - 41
Waist: 31.5 - 33
Hip: 41 - 42.5

US Size XLarge: 16
Chest: 42.5 - 44
Waist: 34.5 - 36
Hip: 44 - 45.5

settings.title: Artfully Crafted
settings.description: Our unique scarves and clothing more than just beautiful prints. We work with artists around the globe to create exclusive works of art to be worn and appreciated. Drawing inspiration from our surroundings, every print starts with an idea, a painting or a sketch.

settings.title: From the Beautiful city of Hangzhou
settings.description: Hangzhou, the capital city of Zhejiang Province, is known for its picturesque landscapes and is a frequent travel destination. Workers who produce our scarves come from the local villages and are highly skilled and trained for years to produce each garment.

settings.text_newsletter: Notify me when this product is available:

settings.title: Artfully Crafted
settings.description: Our unique scarves and clothing more than just beautiful prints. We work with artists around the globe to create exclusive works of art to be worn and appreciated. Drawing inspiration from our surroundings, every print starts with an idea, a painting or a sketch.

settings.title: From the Beautiful City of Suzhou
settings.description: Suzhou is a famous tourism city in China and is known for its lush gardens. We're proud to support the craftspeople who create our scarves and come from the neighboring villages. We also choose to work with a factory that cares for the environment by avoiding production processes and printers that cause pollution and harm the environment.

settings.text_newsletter: Notify me when this product is available:

settings.title: Ocean Conservancy
settings.content: Ocean Conservancy’s Trash Free Seas program is multi pronged – they collect 18 million pounds of trash at their annual international beach cleanup, work to stop the flow of trash at its source, and use research to find innovative, sustainable solutions for the ocean’s biggest threats. With your purchase, you're helping them in this important work.

settings.title: Benefitting the Planet and its People
settings.description: In a world where people are more environmentally conscious than ever, we are pleased to offer products that are sustainable both in the way they are made and in their function. Our blu collection does 3 things – it educates the consumer about sustainability, supports Ocean Conservancy with every purchase, and helps the environment by reducing waste either in its manufacturing method or its utility.

settings.title: Made with Recycled Cotton Fibers
settings.description: Our new bluCotton is 85% recycled cotton, and 15% virgin cotton. The recycled cotton fibers are made from cotton scraps that would otherwise end up in a landfill. By repurposing these scraps into bluCotton, we reduce waste and save a whole lot of valuable water, driving our world towards greater circularity.

settings.text_newsletter: Notify me when this product is available:

settings.title: Newsletter
settings.content: Let's keep in touch

settings.description: We were inspired by the classic California look - oxfords, slacks, sunglasses with a casual and modern vibe. We're tried to channel that in our brand. What's more we only choose the best materials so they're built to last.
Like many people, we're transplants in this city, but we've grown to love it. Come check out our location on Brannan Street in SoMa. You'll see some styles we only sell in the store.

settings.title: We Listen
settings.content: We are always looking for recommendations and feedback on our products. Drop us a line and let us know what you think!

settings.title: Available 24/7
settings.content: Drop us a line on Messenger, email, or call us. We're happy to answer questions, offer general advice, and just say hello.

settings.title: Free Returns
settings.content: Let's be honest - stuff looks different online than it does in person. That's why we offer express delivery and free returns.

settings.title: When will I receive my smoothies?
settings.answer: Because of the logistics of shipping fresh foods and ensuring your Smoothies and Blends and Juices arrive quickly to your doorstep, we only ship orders out on Mondays, Tuesdays and Wednesdays. All orders placed by 11:59pm EST the night before will ship out on the following Monday, Tuesday or Wednesday.

settings.title: Are Mayfair Smoothies and Juices organic?
settings.answer: Yes, all of our Smoothies and Juices are ASCO-certified organic and are Non-GMO Project Verified. This includes fruits and vegetables such as spinach, kale, apples, grapes, strawberries, pears and more.

settings.title: How long will my smoothie last in my fridge?
settings.answer: Mayfair Smoothies and Juices will last as long as you'd like in your freezer. But we suggest you enjoy your Smoothies and Juices before the date on the back of the package.
